analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x5ee4c95b0547afbeba683805301eab291ad28f45.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/13/0x5ee4c95b0547afbeba683805301eab291ad28f45.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_miner' of TheNextBlock.placeBet (/unique_chucks/13/0x5ee4c95b0547afbeba683805301eab291ad28f45.sol#142-143) is not in mixedCase
